chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info:
Lord Toram Riatin,
      p. 74â€”Cairhienin lord,
      son of King Galldrian.  He is a Blademaster.
      He opposed Colavaere, and is in league with
      Caraline and Darlin
      against Rand.  He was last seen running off into
      the fog of Mashadar that Fain released, and is
      presumed dead.
      See also
      Riatin, Toram.
